nio/FacebookFeedBlock.Output:
Creates a new signal for each Facebook Post. Every field on the Post will become a signal attribute. Details about the Facebook Posts can be found
[here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v1.0/post). The following is a list of commonly include attributes, but note that not all will be included on every signal:
-   type
-   id
-   message
-   description
-   link
-   from['name']
-   created_time

lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.description: How often Facebook is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the polling\_interval times the number of queries.

queries.description: List of queries to public posts for. Note that multi-word queries will search for posts that have all of the words but not as a single string.

limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request to Facebook.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

nio/FacebookFeedBlock.Description: Polls Facebook for public posts via Graph API v1.0.

nio/FacebookBlock.Output:
Creates a new signal for each Facebook Post. Every field on the Post will become a signal attribute. Details about the Facebook Posts can be found
[here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.2/post). The following is a list of commonly include attributes, but note that not all will be included on every signal:
-   type
-   id
-   message
-   description
-   link
-   from['name']
-   created_time

lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.description: How often Facebook is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the polling\_interval times the number of queries.

queries.description: List of queries to public posts for. Note that multi-word queries will search for posts that have all of the words but not as a single string.

feed_type.description: Select which enpoint you want. Defaults to the whole 'feed', but can be limited to just 'posts', 'tagged' or 'promotable_posts'.

limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request to Facebook.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

nio/FacebookBlock.Description:
Polls the Facebook graph api ['feed' endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.2/page/feed).
To test your *queries* for validity, enter them into the url:
`https://www.facebook.com/query/feed`
